card-student.description: Passionate about data-driven problem-solving, with a keen interest in collaborating on ecological initiatives and building a career in Data Science.
card-student.card-description: Explore top candidates with detailed profiles to find the perfect fit for your team.

modal-student-profile.talent-description: Passionate about technology and continuous improvement, stays constantly updated on the latest trends in artificial intelligence, automation, and big data. His proactive and results-oriented approach, combined with strong teamwork and leadership skills, allows him to collaborate effectively with different areas to ensure the success of the technological projects he participates in.
